programme.title: Lockup: Wichita: Extended Stay
programme.desc: At Wichita's Sedgwick County Jail an inmate launches an attack on another, sending him to the emergency room; a detective must get to the bottom of it, while a pastor hopes to get to the heart of it.

programme.title: Lockup: Wichita: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Wichita, Kansas and surrounding Sedgwick County take pride in their Wild West roots, but Billy the Kid's gang would be seriously outgunned by the notorious gangs of modern day Wichita.

programme.title: Lockup: Wichita: Extended Stay
programme.desc: In Wichita, Kansas, a young woman says she stabbed a man in self-defense; a skinhead with a violent past leaves his girlfriend battered and bruised.

programme.title: Lockup: Wichita: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A convicted thief continues his stealing ways inside the jail; a former law enforcement officer turned meth addict serves time with and grows closer to her dealer; a man gets arrested for allegedly threatening the sheriff.

programme.title: Lockup: Holman: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Grantt Culliver, warden of one of Alabama's toughest prisons, Holman Correctional Facility, doesn't miss a beat in getting into a disruptive inmate's face, but he's also compassionate and gentle when the situation calls for it.

programme.title: Lockup: Holman: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Of the nearly 1,000 inmates at Holman, the 200 most dangerous must be segregated from the rest; Bobby Gilbert, or "Snake", has spent 19 of his 43 years in the solitary confinement of Ad Seg. because of his violent behavior.

programme.title: Lockup: Holman: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Correctional officers are outnumbered 10 to 1 and are constantly searching over 1,000 inmates to find their home-made weapons, which are very easy to conceal; hours after the Lock Up crew wraps shooting, an inmate is stabbed in the honor dorm.

programme.title: Lockup: Holman: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Holman houses over 170 men who have been sentenced to death and are awaiting execution, as well as 360 who are serving life sentences without parole; all are living with the inevitable: that their only chance of getting out will be inside a coffin.

programme.title: Lockup: Holman: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Burnout is a constant problem and unexcused absences create staff shortages at Alabama's Holman Correctional Facility; that means that designated jobs, like cell searches, which each shift has a requirement to perform, don't always get done.

programme.title: Lockup: Wichita: Extended Stay
programme.desc: At Wichita's Sedgwick County Jail an inmate launches an attack on another, sending him to the emergency room; a detective must get to the bottom of it, while a pastor hopes to get to the heart of it.

programme.title: Lockup: Wichita: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Wichita, Kansas and surrounding Sedgwick County take pride in their Wild West roots, but Billy the Kid's gang would be seriously outgunned by the notorious gangs of modern day Wichita.

programme.title: Lockup: Santa Rosa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: An inmate takes drastic action and leaves his cell in a bloody mess; dangerous contraband is found on another inmate at Florida's Santa Rosa Correctional Institution.

programme.title: Lockup: Santa Rosa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A new arrival to the Santa Rosa Correctional Institution raises serious concerns throughout the maximum-security prison; young correctional officer cadets experience the burn as each one takes a pepper spray shot in the eye.

programme.title: Lockup: Santa Rosa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A massive search for contraband throughout the facility turns up the heat on two inmates inside the Santa Rosa Correctional Institution; a convict prompts an evacuation when he floods his housing unit.

programme.title: Lockup: Santa Rosa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: The prison takes on a military style feel for both the inmates and the officers; a gang unit investigation turns up the heat on a pair of cellmates, before one of them turns on the other.

programme.title: Lockup: Santa Rosa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A cell search inside the maximum-security prison results in some heated words and the discovery of a gang manifesto; inmates express their personal feelings in private to the cameras; one confronts his own mortality.

programme.title: Lockup: Santa Rosa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Inside Florida's toughest maximum-security prison a convicted murderer breaks down the ways of prison, while a young, fresh-faced inmate learns about them; another inmate mails a death threat to the White House and then carries out a shocking act.

programme.title: Lockup: Raw
programme.desc: Up-close and personal with transgender inmates, and inmates with dreams of stardom.

programme.title: Lockup: Raw
programme.desc: To their victims, they were epitome of terror and the face of their nightmares; five of the most notorious inmates to ever appear on Lockup reveal startling insights into their shocking brands of predatory behavior.

programme.title: Lockup: Raw
programme.desc: Sometimes life has other plans, like when the ex leader of a gang faces a whole new reality he discovers the price for coming clean.
